title: Can squeezing a Pixel 2 xl to start Google Assistant cause the screen to crack?
content: I have a 2 inch long "S" shaped crack in the center part of the screen of my Pixel 2 XL.  This is in middle of the screen where the edge to the phone can be squeezed to bring up the Google Assistant.  Has this functionality been known to crack the screen?  It must flex it some.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 2
